attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop paying taxes to Somalia. We pay our taxes, which are then being payed to Somalia. This money is not being used for the right reasons, the only thing it is 'aiding' is the violence and terror in the community. We are not saving anyone by paying this money, we are paying for peoples deaths. Take this money away until we can guarentee it is used correctly.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
